input.activity_signal: Company website found via search (brightpacket.com shows current services), BBB profile listing active, PitchBook profile indicates ongoing business tracking, and D&B business directory listing shows current operations specializing in telecommunications for federal government agencies
input.product_summary: Bright Packet is a telecommunications provider offering IP communication services including voice, network, and cloud services, with specialization in telecommunications and internet infrastructure for federal government agencies and military installations.
